API for pycgmÂ¶

pyCGM

This file is used in joint angle and joint center calculations.

pycgmKinetics

This file is used in coordinate and vector calculations.

pycgmIO

This file is used for the input and output of pycgm functions.

Pipelines

This file is used in adding filters to data and filling gaps in data.

pyCGM_Helpers

This file is used to get sample data.

pycgmCalc

This file uses the input data to perform angle and joint calculations.

pycgmStatic

This file provides helper functions for static calculations.

clusterCalc

This file is used for calculating cluster transformations to apply in the case of a missing marker.

pycgmClusters

This file is used to calculate frames for gap filling.

pycgm
